title: Shetland RFC
text:
Shetland RFC is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> club based in <a href="Lerwick">Lerwick</a>, <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a>. The men's side currently compete in . The women's side play in the Tennent's Women's North League. 
History.
The club was founded in 1878 and is one of the oldest clubs in the Shetland islands. The club play at North Lochside.
Women's side.
Shetland RFC run a women's side, alongside an U18s girls side. Shetland RFC Women were 2019 Tennent's Women's North League champions.
Sevens tournament.
The club run an annual Sevens tournament. Billed as the most northerly Sevens tournament in Britain, it is called the May Madness tournament. 2019's event will be on 25th May.
